archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Governance Framework Master Document
archimate:Principle.documentation: The controlling document of the Sovrin Governance Framework. Appendix A of the Master Document lists the Controlled Documents that constitute the rest of the Sovrin Governance Framework.
